Title: Down with Li Fanwu!
Designer: Art Propaganda Corps of the Harbin Worker-Peasant-Soldier University's Red Rebel Group (哈尔滨工农兵大学红色造反团艺术宣传队)
Notes: Li Fanwu (1912-1986) served in various high-ranking CCP and government positions and was an important leader of the country's rubber industry. . He was severely persecuted during the "Cultural Revolution" and was imprisoned for a long time.The Mao quotation at the top reads along the lines "The people depend on us to be organized. The reactionaties depend on us to organize the people to beat them. All these reactonary things, if you don't beat them, they will not disappear. It's like sweeping the floor, if you don't sweep well, the dust will not disappear by itself".See also the companion poster of this set.
